user_question: What are the best cruises for viewing the Northern Lights, and can you generate an image of a cruise ship under the Northern Lights?
final_answer: The best cruises for viewing the Northern Lights include Hurtigruten's Norway Coastal Voyage, Viking Ocean Cruises' In Search of the Northern Lights, and P&O Cruises' Northern Lights Cruise. Image of a cruise ship under the Northern Lights generated. The best time to see the Northern Lights on these cruises is from late September to late March, with peak viewing from December to February.
